page.title: 07RHYDLEWIS & BETTWS IFAN
page.content:
I live in{Rhydlewis} in a house called Anwylfa. My father works on a farm called Eisteddfa. My dad uses a{jeep or a{van.}In the{village}there are council houses, a butcher and a post office. We have 3 quails, 3 chickens, 3 white cockerels & 3 bantams.{ {Ian Smith}aged 7.
My name is Tania, I live in{Arwel, {Betws Ifan. }I have 1 sister. My father works in{Tanygroes.}My mother breaks in{horses}and my grandad sells {shetlands.}I have a pet cat, dog and shetland of my own. My mother shops in {Newcastle Emlyn.}Tania Davies aged 8.
